## mapll variable

Similar to `mapl()`<!-- -->, but produces new array of transformed values.

( arr q -- arr )

```ts
runU([[1, 2, 3, 4], [10, mul], mapll])
// [ 10, 20, 30, 40]

```
Filter / mapcat:

```
// drop even numbers, duplicate odd ones
run([[1, 2, 3, 4], [dup, even, cond(drop, dup)], mapll])
// [ [ [ 1, 1, 3, 3 ] ], [], {} ]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mapll: (ctx: StackContext) => StackContext
```
